column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place is really good and have had a great time each time I've gone so far. The service isn't bad at all and the food comes out relatively fast. I usually get the original and have had it spicy as well. The ramen is pretty filing and very savory. I love the environment. It can be crowded
column2: but if you're out with friends
column4: casual place to go. If you've never visited before
column5: the servers are really good at giving you tips on what to add
column6: or how to change up the order to fit your tastes! If you're visiting Houston
column7: I would recommend coming here at least once! If you've never had ramen before
column8: you'd definitely want to visit here so you don't ruin your first experience.
